QuestData.Title: The Chef's Apprentice
QuestData.Description:
<Sezahjin rummages through his cooking ingredients in frustration.>
Where is Junji? I sent him to scavenge for vulture eggs, but he hasn't returned.
<Sezahjin pauses for a moment.>
He was just going on about de size of saurolisk eggs, but those oversized lizards are far too dangerous for a boy! He can't possibly be so foolish...
If he has gone to de saurolisk breeding grounds... he may already be dead. Please find him before it's too late!
